slayers (Age of Sigmar) [1,560pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Fyreslayers) [1,560pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [580pts]

      • Auric Runefather [100pts]

        Selections: 0. Fiery Endurance, 0. Voxaxe, General

        Categories: AURIC RUNEFATHER, DUARDIN, HERO, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Leader, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Voxaxe, Command Trait: Fiery Endurance, Lodge Leader, Unit: Auric Runefather, Unit Abilities: Stare Down, Weapon-breaker, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero), Latchkey Grandaxe


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Voxaxe At the start of the battle, pick one of the bearer's melee weapons. Improve that weapon's Rend characteristic by 1. In addition, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with that weapon is 6, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that weapon for that attack.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Fiery Endurance Friendly VOSTARG units wholly within 12" of this model at the start of your movement phase can run in that movement phase and still charge later in that same turn.
        Lodge Leader You can use this command ability at the start of the charge phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Add 1 charge rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS units wholly within 12" of that model until the end of that phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Auric Runefather 4"684+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Stare Down In your hero phase, pick an enemy unit within 3" of this model. Subtract D3 from that unit’s Bravery characteristic until the start of your next hero phase.
        Weapon-breaker At the end of the combat phase, pick an enemy HERO within 3" of this model and roll a dice. On a 6, pick one of the melee weapons that model is armed with. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with that weapon for the rest of the battle. You cannot pick the same weapon to be affected by this ability more than once per battle.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero) Missile8"15+5+-1
        Latchkey Grandaxe Melee3"33+3+-13

      • Auric Runesmiter [120pts]

        Selections: 4. Ember Storm

        Categories: AURIC RUNESMITER, DUARDIN, HERO, PRIEST, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Leader

        Prayer: Ember Storm, Unit: Auric Runesmiter, Unit Abilities: Magmic Tunnelling, Runic Empowerment, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero), Latch-axe, Runic Iron


        Prayer Description Ref
        Ember Storm At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1-2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a friendly unit of VULKITE BERZERKERS or HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS wholly within 18" of this PRIEST. That unit can run and still charge later in that turn.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Auric Runesmiter 4"575+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Magmic Tunnelling Instead of setting up this model on the battlefield, you can place this model to one side and say that it is set up underground as a reserve unit. If you do so, when you would set up another friendly FYRESLAYERS unit, instead of setting up that unit on the battlefield, you can say that it is joining this model underground as a reserve unit. 1 unit can join this model in this way. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up this model anywhere on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units; then set up any unit that joined this model wholly within 12" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units underground that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are destroyed.
        Runic Empowerment At the start of your hero phase, this model can chant this prayer. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1-2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit wholly within 12" of this model, or wholly within 18" of this model if this model is armed with a Forge Key. You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until the start of your next hero phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero) Missile8"15+5+-1
        Latch-axe Melee1"14+3+-2
        Runic Iron Melee1"23+4+-1

      • Auric Runeson on Magmadroth [240pts]

        Selections: 5. Coal-heart Ancient, Wyrmslayer Javelin

        Categories: AURIC RUNESON, DUARDIN, HERO, MAGMADROTH, MONSTER, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Behemoth, Leader

        Command Trait: Molten Battering Ram, Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Auric Runeson on Magmadroth, Unit Abilities: Coal-heart Ancient, Lashing Tail, Roaring Fyrestream, Volcanic Blood, Vying for Glory, Wyrmslayer Javelins, Weapon: Blazing Maw, Claws and Horns, Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero), Wyrmslayer Javelin, Wyrmslayer Javelin (Missile)


        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Molten Battering Ram You can use this command ability at the start of your charge phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly MAGMADROTH that is within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. After that unit makes a charge move in that charge phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that model and roll a dice. On a 2+ that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. The same unit cannot be picked to be affected by this command ability more than once per phase.
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedMoveRoaring FyrestreamClaws and Horns
        Wounds1 0-312"D66
        Wounds2 4-610"D65
        Wounds3 7-98"2D64
        Wounds4 10-127"2D63
        Wounds5 13+6"3D62
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Auric Runeson on Magmadroth *1474+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Coal-heart Ancient Worsen the Rend characteristic of melee weapons that target this model by 1, to a minimum of 0.
        Lashing Tail At the end of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this model. If the roll is less than the number of models in that unit, it suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Roaring Fyrestream Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Roaring Fyrestream. Instead, make the dice roll shown on the damage table above. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of models in the target unit, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of models in the target unit, and the target unit is within 6" of this model, the target unit suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Volcanic Blood Roll a dice each time a wound is allocated to this model that was inflicted by a melee weapon. On a 4+ the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Vying for Glory You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this model if there are any other friendly AURIC RUNESONS within 6" of this model.
        Wyrmslayer Javelins Add 2 to the Damage characteristic for attacks made with this model’s Wyrmslayer Javelin that target a MONSTER.

        Blazing Maw Melee114+2+-2D3
        Claws and Horns Melee1"*4+3+-12

    • Battleline [760pts]

      • Hearthguard Berzerkers [120pts]

        Selections: 5 Hearthguard Berzerkers [120pts], Flamestrike Poleaxe

        Categories: DUARDIN, HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Battleline

        Unit: Hearthguard Berzerkers, Unit Abilities: Duty Unto Death, Karl, Smouldering Braziers, Weapon: Flamestrike Poleaxe, Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit)


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Hearthguard Berzerkers 4"285+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Duty Unto Death Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this unit. Add 2 to the roll if there are any friendly FYRESLAYER HEROS within 10" of this unit. On a 6+ that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Karl 1 model in this unit can be a Karl. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Smouldering Braziers If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Flamestrike Poleaxe is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target in addition to any normal damage.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref

      • Vulkite Bezerkers [320pts]

        Selections: 2x 10 Vulkite Berzerkers [320pts], Fyresteel War-pick

        Categories: DUARDIN, VULKITE BERZERKERS, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Battleline

        Unit: Vulkite Bezerkers, Unit Abilities: Bezerk Fury, Bladed Slingshields, Horn of Grimnir, Karl, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit), Fyresteel Warpick


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Vulkite Bezerkers 4"275+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bezerk Fury Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can choose to unleash this unit’s berserk fury. If you do so, until the end of that phase, if a model from this unit is slain, before that model is removed from play, that model can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        Bladed Slingshields After a unit armed with Bladed Slingshields makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit and roll a dice for each model from the charging unit within 8" of that enemy unit. For each 6, the enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. In addition, add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target a unit armed with Bladed Slingshields if the target unit did not make a charge move in the same turn.
        Horn of Grimnir 1 in every 5 models in this unit can have a Horn of Grimnir. Add 1 to charge rolls for units that include any Horns of Grimnir.
        Karl 1 model in this unit can be a Karl. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit) Missile8"15+5+-1

    • Other [220pts]

      • Auric Hearthguard [120pts]

        Selections: 5 Auric Hearthguards [120pts]

        Categories: AURIC HEARTHGUARD, DUARDIN, ORDER, FYRESLAYERS, Other

        Unit: Auric Hearthguard, Unit Abilities: Karl, Molten Rockbolts, Sworn Protectors, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit), Magmapike, Magmapike (Missile)


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Auric Hearthguard 4"275+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Karl 1 model in this unit can be a Karl. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Magmapike missile weapon.
        Molten Rockbolts Add 1 to the Damage characteristic for attacks made by Magmapike missile weapons that target MONSTER. In addition, if any wounds are inflicted on a MONSTER by Magmapike missile weapons, roll a dice. On a 4+, until the end of that unit’s next turn, halve that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit.
        Sworn Protectors Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly FYRESLAYERS HERO that is not mounted on a MAGMADROTH and is within 3" of any friendly units with this ability. On a 4+ that wound or mortal wound is negated, and you must choose a friendly unit with this ability that is within 3" to suffer 1 mortal wound after all wounds or mortal wounds have been allocated to that friendly HERO.

      • Doomseeker [100pts]

        Categories: DUARDIN, HERO, DOOMSEEKER, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Other

        Unit: Doomseeker, Unit Abilities: Oathbound, Runic Power, Weapon: Doomseeker Axe, Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero), Runic Iron


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Doomseeker 4"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Oathbound At the start of the first battle round, pick 1 enemy unit that this model has sworn to destroy. At the end of the combat phase, if this model is within 3" of that unit, this model can make a pile-in move and then attack with all the melee weapons it is armed with.
        Runic Power Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this model’s melee weapons if it has 1 wound allocated to it. Add 2 to the Damage characteristic of this model’s melee weapons instead if it has 2 or more wounds allocated to it.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Fyreslayers

          Selections: Vostarg

          Battle Trait: Fearsome Surge, Ur-gold Runes, Command Abilities: Honour Our Ancestors, Ur-Gold Rune: Rune of Awakened Steel, Rune of Farsight, Rune of Fiery Determination, Rune of Fury, Rune of Relentless Zeal, Rune of Searing Heat


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Fearsome Surge Add 1 to charge rolls for VOSTARG units. In addition, in your movement phase in the first battle round, if you declare a friendly VOSTARG unit will run, do not make a run roll. Instead, add 6" to the Move characteristic of all models in that unit for that phase.
        Ur-gold Runes At the start of your hero phase, you can activate one of the following six ur-gold runes. To do so, state which rune will be activated and roll a dice. On a 1-5, the rune has the standard effect. On a 6 it also has the enhanced effect. The effect(s) of the rune lasts until the start of your next hero phase. Each ur-gold rune can only be activated once in each battle, and no more than one can be actived at the same time. Once you have used a rune, you can choose a new one to use in your next hero phase, but you cannot use the same one again.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Honour Our Ancestors You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick a friendly VOSTARG HERO. Until the end of that phase, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO and friendly units of VULKITE BERZERKERS and HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS wholly within 12" of that HERO. You cannot use this command ability more than once per phase.
        Ur-Gold Rune EffectEnhanced Effect Ref
        Rune of Awakened Steel Improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units by 1.Improve the Rend characteristic by a further 1.
        Rune of Farsight Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Fiery Determination Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Friendly FYRESLAYERS units do not have to take battleshock tests.
        Rune of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Relentless Zeal Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Searing Heat If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit is 6, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the weapon for that attack.Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly FYRESLAYERS units when this rune is activated; on a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Points Variation

        Selections: - 250

        Categories: Game Options

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
